targets.rawSql:
/* NODES */
WITH gov_mapping AS (
    SELECT 
        rgf.id as rgf_id,
        CASE 
            WHEN cl.code = 'FEDERAL_ADMINISTRATION' THEN COALESCE(admin.supreme_federal_authority_short, admin.supreme_federal_authority, 'Bundesverwaltung')
            WHEN cl.code = 'FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT' THEN COALESCE(dept.de, 'Bundesregierung')
            WHEN cl.code = 'HOUSE_OF_REPRESENTATIVES' THEN 'Bundestag'
            ELSE 'Sonstige'
        END as entity_name
    FROM recent_government_function rgf
    JOIN code_label cl ON rgf.type_label_id = cl.id
    LEFT JOIN recent_gov_federal_admin admin ON rgf.id = admin.recent_gov_fn_id
    LEFT JOIN recent_gov_federal_gov gov ON rgf.id = gov.recent_gov_fn_id
    LEFT JOIN department dept ON gov.department_id = dept.id
),
raw_edges AS (
    SELECT li.id AS source_id, gm.entity_name AS target_name
    FROM lobbyist_identity li
    JOIN gov_mapping gm ON li.recent_gov_function_id = gm.rgf_id
    WHERE li.recent_gov_function_present = true
    UNION ALL
    SELECT ep.identity_id AS source_id, gm.entity_name AS target_name
    FROM entrusted_person ep
    JOIN gov_mapping gm ON ep.recent_gov_function_id = gm.rgf_id
    WHERE ep.recent_gov_function_present = true
),
target_stats AS (
    SELECT target_name, COUNT(*) as degree FROM raw_edges GROUP BY 1
),
filtered_targets AS (
    SELECT target_name FROM target_stats WHERE degree >= 3
),
filtered_edges AS (
    SELECT re.* FROM raw_edges re JOIN filtered_targets ft ON re.target_name = ft.target_name
),
source_stats AS (
    SELECT source_id, COUNT(*) as degree FROM filtered_edges GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT 
    'ORG_' || li.id as id,
    li.name_text as title,
    'circle' as shape,
    'Organisation' as "subTitle",
    'green' as color,
    ss.degree as "mainStat",
    0.0 as "arc"
FROM source_stats ss
JOIN lobbyist_identity li ON ss.source_id = li.id

UNION ALL

SELECT
    'GOV_' || target_name as id,
    target_name as title,
    'triangle' as shape,
    'Behörde' as "subTitle",
    'red' as color,
    ts.degree as "mainStat",
    1.0 as "arc"
FROM target_stats ts
WHERE target_name IN (SELECT target_name FROM filtered_targets);

/* EDGES */
WITH gov_mapping AS (
    SELECT 
        rgf.id as rgf_id,
        CASE 
            WHEN cl.code = 'FEDERAL_ADMINISTRATION' THEN COALESCE(admin.supreme_federal_authority_short, admin.supreme_federal_authority, 'Bundesverwaltung')
            WHEN cl.code = 'FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT' THEN COALESCE(dept.de, 'Bundesregierung')
            WHEN cl.code = 'HOUSE_OF_REPRESENTATIVES' THEN 'Bundestag'
            ELSE 'Sonstige'
        END as entity_name
    FROM recent_government_function rgf
    JOIN code_label cl ON rgf.type_label_id = cl.id
    LEFT JOIN recent_gov_federal_admin admin ON rgf.id = admin.recent_gov_fn_id
    LEFT JOIN recent_gov_federal_gov gov ON rgf.id = gov.recent_gov_fn_id
    LEFT JOIN department dept ON gov.department_id = dept.id
),
raw_edges AS (
    SELECT li.id AS source_id, gm.entity_name AS target_name
    FROM lobbyist_identity li
    JOIN gov_mapping gm ON li.recent_gov_function_id = gm.rgf_id
    WHERE li.recent_gov_function_present = true
    UNION ALL
    SELECT ep.identity_id AS source_id, gm.entity_name AS target_name
    FROM entrusted_person ep
    JOIN gov_mapping gm ON ep.recent_gov_function_id = gm.rgf_id
    WHERE ep.recent_gov_function_present = true
),
target_weights AS (
    SELECT target_name, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM raw_edges GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
  'E' || ROW_NUMBER() OVER () as id,
  'ORG_' || re.source_id as source,
  'GOV_' || re.target_name as target,
  1.0 as "mainStat"
FROM raw_edges re
JOIN target_weights tw ON re.target_name = tw.target_name
WHERE tw.cnt >= 3;

panels.title: Drehtür-Netzwerk (Wer kennt wen aus der Regierung?)
